name: Spark (itch) (Fripop)
description:
Find The way out of the darkness. Use the spark to find the way. The spark is slowly fading when not held in hand.

RULES
- Use WASD to walk and jump.
- use LEFT MOUSE Click to throw the spark.
- use RIGHT MOUSE Click to call the spark back 
- use R to respawn at last checkpoint
- stand on white panels with light in your hand to recharge it
- send the light in the totem to reveal hidden panels

THEME - ONLY ONE
You have only one spark that you can use to find the way out of the darkness.

CREDITS - soundtrack https://freesound.org/people/TheDweebMan/sounds/277192/?fbclid=IwAR2d_uBqm0N94UM...
